title: Movie Streaming Platform
shortDescription: • Next.js (App Router) + TypeScript with auth, profiles, and an admin CMS for uploads. • Automated FFmpeg pipelines generate multi-bitrate HLS renditions, thumbnails, and metadata per upload. • Resilient playback via hls.js with MP4 fallback for cross-device compatibility. • Zod-validated APIs + Prisma/PostgreSQL; Dockerized stack with MinIO/S3 object storage.
